snippet: The United States and Egypt traded barbs on Twitter and in the news media over the comedian, Bassem Youssef, who is being investigated by Egyptian prosecutors.
abstract: Legal troubles of Egyptian comedian Bassem Youssef escalate into diplomatic incident when United States and Egypt traded barbs on Twitter and in news media over issues including freedom of speech, religion and sovereignty.
lead_paragraph: The United States and Egypt traded barbs on Twitter and in the news media over the comedian, Bassem Youssef, who is being investigated by Egyptian prosecutors.

headline.main: Diplomatic Incident Arises Over Egyptian Comedian
headline.print_headline: Diplomatic Incident Arises Over Egyptian Comedian
